Class Human

java.lang.Object
Cell
Human
public class Human extends Cell
A human cell whos behaviour changes over time. If they have no neighbours, they will die of loneliness. After reaching its teenage years, they will have a higher probability of dying by accident. After reaching age 70, they will have a 50% probability of dying of old age. If it does not have at least one tree neighbour, it will die. However, if the dead cell has two human neighbours who are 18+, a new human cell is born. FULFILS BASE TASK 2.2 FULFILS CHALLENGE TASK 1 FULFILS CHALLENGE TASK 2.1 - Mutualistic Relationship with Tree
